page.title: 05Churches and Religion Part 1
page.content: The Church of England is well represented in Clevedon,with most of the churches dating from the latter half of the nineteenth century. St.Andrews St.Johns St.Marys St.Pauls(at Walton-in-Gordano) St.Peters All Saints(at East Clevedon) Christchurch A Roman Catholic Friary,served by the Franciscan friars,was founded in 1887. The Methodist Church in Linden Road dates from 1883-there is a second Methodist Church situated in Kenn Road. There are other denominations represented in Clevedon. They include..... 1. A Baptist Church in Station Road. 2. An Evangelical Free Church Copse Rd
